Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Computer Vision, Information Technology, Internet of Things, Machine Learning, Software
FullDescription: Zyfra develops industrial digitalization technologies, invests in such products and improves the Industrial Internet of Things and Artificial Intelligence environment. Company's key fields of industry are machinery, metallurgy, mining, oil & gas and chemical enterprises. They promote readymade industry solutions in predictive analytics and data analysis, tech processes optimization, machinery and floor staff monitoring.
